/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/ABGR/ABGR.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/GLUT/bitmap.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/c_tut/c_tut.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/c_tut/c_tut_01.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/c_tut/c_tut_02.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/c_tut/c_tut_03.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/example/example.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/example/example01.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/mysql/mysql.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_01.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_02.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_03.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_04.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_05.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_06.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_07.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/new/new_08.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/red/chapter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/red/red.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/simple/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/simple/shader.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/simple/simple.cpp.o CMakeFiles/game.dir/src/simple/swindow.cpp.o  -o game -ldl -lGL -D_REENTRANT -lglfw -lGLEW -lglut -lfreetype -lSDL2
